Name: Caf√© Verhoeff
Review Text: Unfriendly Dutch owner. They prefer their own people. Live here now 12 years, this was my worst visit in a cafe. They have a big sign for PIN, but do not mention, that you need to order more than 10‚Ç¨. Bitterballen took 35 minutes. Tourists should not go there, since they answer back in Dutch. Check nicer places.

Name: Caf√© Verhoeff
Review Text: Fantastic local pub. The bartender and other patrons were more than welcoming . We were fed ossesworst and even had a gentleman play us some American tunes that he knew on the piano. Protip: let the bartender recommend your drinks.

Review Text: Great bar for a pre dinner glass of wine. Relaxed friendly atmosphere, lovely bar lady, nice wines. What's not to like ? if we visit amsterdam again we'll be back.
